## AlLocatorMatrix.getBaseUrl() method

Chops off fragments, query strings, and any trailing slashes, and returns what \*should\* be just the base URL. I make no promises about the quality of this code when confronted with incorrect or incomplete inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getBaseUrl(uri: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  uri | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
